string.value: #b#p9270059##k looks so down and depressed. Maybe there's something you can do to make her feel better.

#b#p9270059##k is standing with a growling stomach. She doesn't want to eat anything else but famous #b#t2022203##k from Local Speciality Shop in Singapore or Kampung? Let's get #b10 
#t2022203##k for her. 

#t2022203# #r#c2022203#/10#k
Nothing taste better than #b#t2022203##k for an empty stomach.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 6,000 Able to proceed to 'I need Vitamin C' as next quest.
*Grook Grook* Oh no, this is embarrassing. Now, I'm sure you're aware of my hunger. At least it's not gas? Haha!

I don't know why, but I have such a big craving for the famous #b#t2022203##k. A craving for exactly 10 of them. Will there be anyone who can get it for me from Local Speciality Shop in Singapore or Kampung?
Hee hee. Really?! How nice of you to be going all the way to Singapore. Thanks!
Oh no, I'm going to be hungry for the rest of the day.
Yummy! #b#t2022203##k is one of my favorites!
This is more than I normally eat, but they are just so delicious! Yum yum!
